Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flap extension asymmetry. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 03/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
